title: Sustainable Dairy Cropping Systems: The Virtual Dairy Herd

tasks.task: Jenny Isler's talk on sustainable dairy cropping systems
subtasks: Understanding the virtual dairy farm project
Analyzing feed inventory and quality impacts
Evaluating economics of different cropping systems
Recognizing the role of canola in feed and fuel
Considering the effect of weather on crop yields
Assessing income over feed costs relative to BMP
Noting the importance of insect management
